function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective air filtration leading to airborne transmission of viruses within buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission and spread in the workplace","Mitigation":"Implementation of high-efficiency air filters to effectively filter out particles and reduce the airborne transmission of viruses","Technologies":"HEPA filters, high-efficiency air filtration systems","People":"Occupants of the building, workers, employees","Owner":"Building management, employers, facility maintenance staff"},{"Description":"Misconceptions about the effectiveness of HEPA filters in capturing coronaviruses","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of risk mitigation potential and improper use of air filtration systems","Mitigation":"Education and awareness about the efficiency of HEPA filters in capturing coronaviruses, clarification of misconceptions through reliable information sources","Technologies":"Education and informational resources","People":"Building occupants, maintenance staff, HVAC technicians","Owner":"Health and safety authorities, facility management, employers"},{"Description":"Limited use of HEPA filters in non-healthcare occupational settings","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission in non-healthcare workplaces with inadequate air filtration","Mitigation":"Promotion of HEPA filter use in non-healthcare settings, incentivizing the adoption of HEPA filters, and regulatory requirements for air filtration in workplaces","Technologies":"Advocacy and awareness campaigns, regulatory policies","People":"Non-healthcare workplace occupants, employers, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Health and safety agencies, government bodies, employers"}]}
